title: Riding cities
text: This is the first project where basic HTML and CSS data are used. Based on the proposed Figma layout, adjustments were made and missing elements were added.

title: Booki
text: This project involves creating a travel agency web page using HTML and CSS, taking into account that the application should be responsive and function correctly on various devices.

title: Print it
text: To implement this project, it was necessary to integrate a carousel using JavaScript. In this application, I familiarized myself with basic skills of using and integrating JS.

title: Architect's website
text: This project is a dynamic web application using JS and API requests, DOM manipulation, and modal window creation. In this project, I utilized numerous JS capabilities without using third-party libraries.

title: Kasa
text: The Kasa project is a React web application. This web application includes API requests to the backend to display data in the user interface, navigation using React Router, and component reuse.

title: Automation with Cypress
text: In this project, skills were acquired in developing test scenarios, writing tests using Cypress, implementing tests, and compiling a report on the web application's performance.
